text.section: This subtitle provides minimum standards to protect consumers in the State.

A county, a municipality, or an agency of a county or municipality may adopt standards concerning distress sales, within the scope of its authority, only if the standards:
Are at least as stringent as the provisions of this subtitle; and
Are not inconsistent with the provisions of this subtitle.
This subtitle is enforceable under Title 13 of this article or by any appropriate local jurisdiction.
